name: Fruit Splash - Funny Adventure
description:
Fruit Splash Funny Adventure connect delicious fruit to crush them and make an explosion.
This is the ultimate smasher game with many levels will addict you.
Add power ups by connecting same fruit in a flow.
Link the fruit and eliminate fruity.


How To Play Fruit Splash Funny Adventure:

Connect the fruit that are identical and smash it.

Features:

High rated graphics
Different and interesting Obstacles.
Lots of fresh and vivid fruit.
